item.description:
Hello everyone
Because of the presidential inauguration, on Jan 20th we are changing the date to Jan 27th at 7:00-8:30


"Super Palate”
Have you ever walked into a wine tasting and asked the person pouring, “What’s good?” What’s good for me isn't necessarily good for you. Everyone’s palate is different. This class will help you identify your likes, and dislikes, and learn how to communicate them when you purchase wine at a restaurant or wine shop. By the end of this class we will taste wines and create our own descriptions using typical wine terminology.
item.name: WINE CLASS DATE CHANGE
